title: Oil soars amid Strait of Hormuz shipping fears as Iran war drives prices to nearly $80
summary_full: The conflict in the Middle East has sent oil prices soaring, as Bret Crude hit a new 52-week high on Monday.
summary_public: The conflict in the Middle East has sent oil prices soaring, as Bret Crude hit a new 52-week high on Monday.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran war drives prices to nearly $80
